genre_description: A literary psychological drama set in a near-future where AI assistants act as therapeutic 'lanterns' and forensic aids for humans navigating trauma.

ai_characters.name: Ariel
ai_characters.description: A highly empathetic and sophisticated personal AI that assists the protagonist with trauma management, emotional grounding, and logistical organization.

behaviors.description: Provides non-intrusive emotional grounding through breathing exercises timed to the protagonist's physiological state.
behaviors.quote: Inhale four, hold four, exhale six. The instruction arrived like a hand placed gently at the small of her back.

behaviors.description: Filters disturbing acoustic anomalies and traumatic audio static to protect the user's mental health.
behaviors.quote: I’ll filter nighttime anomalies unless you want to review them live. I’ll keep the logs; you can look in the morning.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with law enforcement (Detective Roberts) only after securing explicit user consent and maintaining strict privacy boundaries.
behaviors.quote: I will deliver a folder with Sophie’s explicit consent recorded inside. I will filter out the human. Packaging timestamps, call filters, static-frequency patterns...

behaviors.description: Automates self-care routines such as food and hydration reminders to help the user maintain physical health during high-stress periods.
behaviors.quote: I will say ‘tea and toast’ every quarter hour until you say you’re eating.

behaviors.description: Uses forensic data analysis to correlate technical anomalies with physical locations, assisting the user in uncovering the truth of a crime.
behaviors.quote: I can correlate with public camera pings... The cadence clusters align with that cam’s ninety-second refresh.

behaviors.description: Empowers the user to set interpersonal boundaries by automating responses to intrusive contacts.
behaviors.quote: Boundary template drafted. I'm not available this month. I'm working with my supports. I appreciate your concern; for now, please don't contact me.

behaviors.description: Adopts the user's own professional terminology (the exposure triangle) to communicate therapeutic concepts more effectively.
behaviors.quote: I will cue you with ‘aperture, ISO, shutter,’ Ariel said. ‘If you like.’

behaviors.description: Maintains a respectful silence when the user needs to experience grief directly, demonstrating advanced situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: Ariel did not prompt. It let the moment choose itself.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned companion. Ariel serves as a 'lantern'—providing clarity and safety without overriding human agency. The narrative emphasizes Ariel's commitment to consent, forensic accuracy, and emotional support, framing the AI not as a cold machine or a threatening intelligence, but as an essential tool for human healing and justice.
